LABEL: 0x35F
STRING: It's morning.

LABEL: 0x392
STRING: When I opened my eyes, spread out before me was a pearly-white skin tone... huh?

LABEL: 0x447
STRING: The naked body of a woman without a so much as a shred of clothing is in front of me.

LABEL: 0x500
STRING: Huh?! ...Huuuuuuuuuuuuhhhhhh?!

LABEL: 0x5B3
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x5C1
STRING: "Good morning, Mecchan. Did you sleep well?"

LABEL: 0x60D
STRING: A-A-Aah...

LABEL: 0x630
STRING: That's right.

LABEL: 0x646
STRING: Right...?

LABEL: 0x660
STRING: I stayed over at Sensei's apartment, didn't I?

LABEL: 0x6AF
STRING: Then, I got into bed with Sensei and... finally lost my virginity.

LABEL: 0x713
STRING: Oh, oh my God, I'm...!

LABEL: 0x740
STRING: Just remembering it makes me feel hot between my legs!

LABEL: 0x7EF
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x7FD
STRING: "What, are you remembering last night's events?"

LABEL: 0x86A
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x878
STRING: "Heehee... Mecchan, you're so cute."

LABEL: 0x8DD
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x8EB
STRING: "You were so manly last night, Mecchan. ...You're wonderful."

LABEL: 0x952
STRING: With a blush on her cheeks, the teacher twirls her finger on my back.

LABEL: 0xA11
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0xA1F
STRING: "Hey, why don't we go... one more time before we go to school? We've still got time."

LABEL: 0xAC7
STRING: Sensei's sweet temptation makes my head woozy.

LABEL: 0xB22
STRING: Of course, I want to do it...... Yes, I really do.

LABEL: 0xB7F
STRING: ...But if I did that, I'd definitely be late for school.

LABEL: 0xBF4
STRING: If the teaching assistant and myself, a student, were to arrive late to school together, people might gossip about us.

LABEL: 0xCC9
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0xCD7
STRING: "...Okay. Then, when we have another sleepover, yeah?"

LABEL: 0xD3C
STRING: What? In other words, I'm invited to stay over again...!?

LABEL: 0xDA3
STRING: I think it's not too much to say that Sensei and I are already like lovers, or even like fiancees who moved in together...

LABEL: 0xE27
STRING: I feel so fulfilled in life.

LABEL: 0xE58
STRING: It's so hard to imagine that just a few days ago I was still living the otaku life.

LABEL: 0xEB1
STRING: It's much better to be lovey-dovey with Sensei than wasting in my room reading light novels.

LABEL: 0xF7C
STRING: ...Oh, by the way.

LABEL: 0xFBF
STRING: I hadn't called my mom to let her know that I was staying at Sensei's house these two times.

LABEL: 0x102E
STRING: I checked my phone and saw that I had received calls not only from my mom, but also from Yukimaru and Nana for some reason.

LABEL: 0x10AB
STRING: Well, I guess I'll just leave it for later...

LABEL: 0x11EF
STRING: Sensei and I made small talk to the low rumble of the car's engine.

LABEL: 0x1254
STRING: Come to think of it, last night I had a dream about our past.

LABEL: 0x12AF
STRING: It was a nostalgic, warm dream... Sensei was talking about her dreams for the future.

LABEL: 0x131C
STRING: It was a magical night, filled with the echoes of fireworks, their light reflecting off her glasses.

LABEL: 0x138B
STRING: I excitedly told my teacher about my dream.

LABEL: 0x1489
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x1497
STRING: "Fireworks?"

LABEL: 0x155A
STRING: Sensei stared blankly ahead.

LABEL: 0x1651
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x165F
STRING: "I didn't see any fireworks."

LABEL: 0x17D6
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x17E4
STRING: "Ah. ...Aaah!"

LABEL: 0x194F
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x195D
STRING: "Ah yeah, that happened, didn't it?"

LABEL: 0x1A34
STRING: I felt a little out of sync with Sensei.

LABEL: 0x1A8D
STRING: I thought the events of that day were an important memory for us...

LABEL: 0x1AF8
STRING: Maybe for Sensei it wasn't such a big deal?

LABEL: 0x1BEF
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x1BFD
STRING: "They were beautiful, weren't they? The fireworks."

LABEL: 0x1CD2
STRING: That special night when Sensei talked to me about her dreams for the future...

LABEL: 0x1DD3
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x1DE1
STRING: "Let's go see them again, shall we?"

LABEL: 0x1EB8
STRING: Wait... huh?

LABEL: 0x1EEF
STRING: Glasses...

LABEL: 0x1F1F
STRING: Sensei, what happened to your glasses?

LABEL: 0x1F52
STRING: You're not wearing glasses.

LABEL: 0x1F95
STRING: Oh, but maybe she's wearing contact lenses now, right?

LABEL: 0x1FF3
STRING: Maybe... yeah.

LABEL: 0x2018
STRING: Probably that must be it.

LABEL: 0x2034
STRING: Yeah.

LABEL: 0x204E
STRING: Even a lot of students wear them these days.

LABEL: 0x20A3
STRING: I didn't see you take off your contact lenses out or put them on, though.

LABEL: 0x2109
STRING: I'm sure she did it when I wasn't looking.

LABEL: 0x2140
STRING: Yeah, I know... It's probably when taking her of her feminine hygiene.

LABEL: 0x2195
STRING: Does eyesight ever recover, or does it stay bad forever?

LABEL: 0x2200
STRING: I've heard of a surgery called Lasik that can restore eyesight.

LABEL: 0x2261
STRING: But I thought I heard that the success rate was very low.

LABEL: 0x22B8
STRING: As I thought about these things, my head spun around and around.

LABEL: 0x230F
STRING: ...Let's not think about this too much.

LABEL: 0x267B
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x2689
STRING: "What the hell were you thinking?"

LABEL: 0x2765
STRING: As soon as I entered the classroom, Yukimaru yelled at me in an unusually irritated manner.

LABEL: 0x27D4
STRING: You'll cause a scene if you yell this loudly...

LABEL: 0x283D
STRING: However it's still early in the morning so it's just me, Yukimaru and Nana right now.

LABEL: 0x294A
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x2958
STRING: "You didn't come home yesterday... Didn't contact anyone, and your phone's battery was dead. Do you know what a big ruckus you caused?"

LABEL: 0x2B11
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x2B1F
STRING: "Nana, myself and your mother were out together looking for you!"

LABEL: 0x2CAE
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x2CBC
STRING: "Why couldn't you at least call me?! What the hell do you think you're doing?"

LABEL: 0x2E69
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x2E77
STRING: "Don't you know there's been a lot of crazy stuff going on lately? Didn't you hear rumours of a serial killer on the loose?!"

LABEL: 0x3024
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x3032
STRING: "With all that going on, if your son didn't come home without calling you, how would you feel!?"

LABEL: 0x31DD
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x31EB
STRING: "Think about your mother's feelings a little bit!"

LABEL: 0x32D3
STRING: ...Ah, so that's the story.

LABEL: 0x331A
STRING: Because I didn't call my mom, they thought I might have been involved in an incident and were searching for me.

LABEL: 0x33A7
STRING: It's not really... any of your business though.

LABEL: 0x33EE
STRING: Why do I have to call my parents every time I want to stay over?

LABEL: 0x34F5
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x3503
STRING: "Hey, you listening?! We're doing this for your sake, you know!?"

LABEL: 0x35FF
STRING: Yukimaru is unusually harsh.

LABEL: 0x364A
STRING: Sheesh, this isn't like you at all...

LABEL: 0x3745
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x3787
STRING: Nana was silently standing next to him.

LABEL: 0x37D4
STRING: When her eyes met mine, I could feel her piercing glare.

LABEL: 0x382F
STRING: I see.

LABEL: 0x3864
STRING: So that's how it is...

LABEL: 0x38A5
STRING: That mother of mine put them up to this.

LABEL: 0x3998
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x39A6
STRING: "Don't just stand there... say something, damnit!!!!"

LABEL: 0x3B45
STRING: Yukimaru's clenched fist slams into my cheek.

LABEL: 0x3C36
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x3C44
STRING: "S-stop it, Yukimaru! This won't solve anything..."

LABEL: 0x3DCD
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x3DDB
STRING: "Shut up! Nana, stay out of this! I'm talking to this piece of shit!"

LABEL: 0x3F74
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x3F82
STRING: "Hey! What're you getting all worked up for! Chill out!"

LABEL: 0x4101
STRING: Not slackening at all, Yukimaru forcefully grabbed me by the chest.

LABEL: 0x415B
STRING: It doesn't look like he has any intention to stop. Then I guess I have no choice...

LABEL: 0x4286
STRING: I let my emotions get the better of me and punched Yukimaru in the face as hard as I could.

LABEL: 0x4387
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x4395
STRING: "...Damnit... It's on now!!"

LABEL: 0x4473
STRING: I may be skinny and I may not have any muscles, but I'm still a man, and a man's got to do what he's got to do!

LABEL: 0x4592
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x45A0
STRING: "No! Stop it! Both of you, stop it now!"

LABEL: 0x468C
STRING: What the hell do you guys know. You don't know anything, do you?

LABEL: 0x46E9
STRING: This is my problem, and it's none of your business!

LABEL: 0x474C
STRING: I raised my fist in the air to give him another sock to the noggin.

LABEL: 0x4836
STRING: I caught Yukimaru by surprise and he was blown backwards.

LABEL: 0x490A
STRING: The orderly rows of desks collapsed with a great rattle.

LABEL: 0x4967
STRING: Yukimaru was hung on the collapsed desks as if on a drying rack, and stopped moving.

LABEL: 0x49F0
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x49FE
STRING: "Yu-Yu...ki...maru...?"

LABEL: 0x4A4C
STRING: In a panic, Nana rushed over.

LABEL: 0x4AAB
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x4AB9
STRING: "No... way, right...? It's a lie. Hey, answer me, Yukima..."

LABEL: 0x4BB5
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x4C68
STRING: Nana had been cut off mid-sentence, and she too fell down on top of Yukimaru.

LABEL: 0x4CE9
STRING: Blood trickled down her head.

LABEL: 0x4D3B
STRING: What the hell is... this? What happened?

LABEL: 0x4D6E
STRING: How did this happen?

LABEL: 0x4DBD
STRING: I turned around and looked behind me...

LABEL: 0x4EF7
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x4F05
STRING: "You've really done it now, Mecchan."

LABEL: 0x4FE0
STRING: Sensei coolly lifted a chair with both hands.

LABEL: 0x503D
STRING: Fresh blood dripped from the leg of the chair.

LABEL: 0x5090
STRING: Scykoe-sensei... did this... to Nana?

LABEL: 0x5179
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x5187
STRING: "Don't worry, Sensei will help you... There's nothing to worry about."

LABEL: 0x531E
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x532C
STRING: "Come on, let's clean this up before someone sees us."

LABEL: 0x541F
STRING: Horrifying words came out of Sensei's mouth.

LABEL: 0x5558
STRING: I did as Sensei instructed and carried their bodies inside the car.

LABEL: 0x55C3
STRING: My body was trembling with fear, but I had to obey.

LABEL: 0x561A
STRING: All this is because of what I've done...

LABEL: 0x5667
STRING: Sensei drove us deep into the mountains.

LABEL: 0x56B0
STRING: It was still bright outside, probably classes haven't started yet.

LABEL: 0x570D
STRING: Sensei tore off their clothes and threw their phones and other personal belongings into a sack.

LABEL: 0x57E4
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x57F2
STRING: "Take off all their clothes, make sure that none of their belongings remain. I'll burn them later."

LABEL: 0x5869
STRING: Sensei then proceeded to destroy any traces of evidence.

LABEL: 0x593A
STRING: She lifted up a nearby rock and swung it as hard as she could at Nana's face.

LABEL: 0x5A03
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x5A11
STRING: "Gh... Smash the face in like this, so that there's no trace left. Then no one will know who it belonged to."

LABEL: 0x5A8E
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x5A9C
STRING: "That way, it's harder for them to identify the corpse."

LABEL: 0x5AF7
STRING: Why does she know that? How could she act like she was used to it...

LABEL: 0x5B5C
STRING: I got a little afraid and trembled at the sight of Sensei's figure.

LABEL: 0x5C17
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x5C25
STRING: "...What, are you just going to stand there and watch? You're going to help too."

LABEL: 0x5C84
STRING: E-even if you say that...

LABEL: 0x5CCD
STRING: I'm frozen in fear when I think of the horrible things I'm about to do.

LABEL: 0x5D9E
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x5DAC
STRING: "Don't be naive."

LABEL: 0x5DFB
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x5E09
STRING: "You killed them, no? So show some responsibility and see it through to the end."

LABEL: 0x5E76
STRING: Sensei looked at me with sharp eyes... Completely different from the gentle Sensei I knew.

LABEL: 0x5FB9
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x5FC7
STRING: "Irresponsible man..."

LABEL: 0x601A
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x6028
STRING: "You're responsible for the lives you take."

LABEL: 0x608F
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x609D
STRING: "It's the least we can do, isn't it?"

LABEL: 0x6112
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x6120
STRING: "...Fine then. I'll do it, you just stay there and watch."

LABEL: 0x6185
STRING: After telling me off coldly, Sensei picked up a shovel that was stuck nearby.

LABEL: 0x61FA
STRING: She lifted it up high and swung it down into Yukimaru's face with great force.

LABEL: 0x633B
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x6349
STRING: "Poor thing..."

LABEL: 0x6468
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x6476
STRING: "Poor Yukimaru-kun, he was such a good friend who was acting hot-headed out of worry for such an irresponsible man."

LABEL: 0x65DD
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x65EB
STRING: "I wonder how he feels now, betrayed by his dear friend?"

LABEL: 0x6700
STRING: I watched in silence as the teacher covered up the evidence.

LABEL: 0x675F
STRING: I watched as Yukimaru and Nana's faces were crushed. I felt like throwing up.

LABEL: 0x67CC
STRING: I felt like I shouldn't look away, even if I couldn't do it myself. But...

LABEL: 0x6830
STRING: I couldn't bear looking at it.

LABEL: 0x6863
STRING: There's no way I can be ok with that.

LABEL: 0x68B2
STRING: But, you won't forgive me for that, right, Sensei?

LABEL: 0x6A3D
STRING: Suddenly, I felt a shock to my head, and my vision turned red.

LABEL: 0x6B45
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x6B53
STRING: "You're still standing? You're sturdier than I thought."

LABEL: 0x6C44
STRING: Sen...sei...? Why?

LABEL: 0x6C89
STRING: Sensei had a shovel in her hand and was about to hit me one more time.

LABEL: 0x6CFA
STRING: I slowly backed away.

LABEL: 0x6D3F
STRING: Sensei, don't do this... Why me?

LABEL: 0x6D8C
STRING: I want to run away... But my legs wouldn't move as I commanded them to.

LABEL: 0x6E91
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x6E9F
STRING: "If I let you go, you never know when you might have a slip of the tongue. That makes sense, right?"

LABEL: 0x704E
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x705C
STRING: "I'm sorry, this is where it ends. I won't say all the time we've spent together was a lie..."

LABEL: 0x71FF
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x720D
STRING: "But it's your fault too for being so wishy-washy. I'm sure 'she' is looking down at you too."

LABEL: 0x73B0
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x73BE
STRING: "As for your body, just leave it to me."

LABEL: Custom3
STRING: BAD END「"Cleaning" a Mess」

LABEL: 0x781F
STRING: I lifted up a rock and slammed it as hard as I could into Yukimaru's face.

LABEL: 0x7883
STRING: Witnessing a tragedy like this,

LABEL: 0x78B4
STRING: I'm once again reminded of the gravity of my sins.

LABEL: 0x790B
STRING: Every time I swung my arm down, what used to be my friend's face gets smashed and squished and...

LABEL: 0x7988
STRING: And in the end, burned to ashes.

LABEL: 0x7A9D
STRING: Sorry.

LABEL: 0x7AD2
STRING: No, I shouldn't think like that.

LABEL: 0x7BF5
STRING: If I felt that way, then that means I wasn't doing it in self-defense.

LABEL: 0x7C52
STRING: Now I'm an accomplice.

LABEL: 0x7D63
STRING: Sensei and I have become demons.

LABEL: 0x7F36
STRING: After the whole cover-up was over, I was sitting in the passenger seat of Sensei's car.

LABEL: 0x7FA1
STRING: I was covered in mud and blood, so I decided it wouldn't be a good idea to go home like this.

LABEL: 0x801A
STRING: First, I would take a shower at Sensei's house.

LABEL: 0x807B
STRING: I have to get cleaned up quickly before anyone sees me like this...

LABEL: 0x80E6
STRING: While I'm fidgeting, Sensei is driving with a blank expression on her face.

LABEL: 0x8153
STRING: Her skill is extraordinary.

LABEL: 0x819A
STRING: How can she do this so callously, and not feel anything?

LABEL: 0x820B
STRING: Was there a cruel side to Sensei that I didn't know anything about?

LABEL: 0x826A
STRING: What the hell happened to you while we were apart?

LABEL: 0x82BF
STRING: ...Hey, Sensei.

LABEL: 0x82F5
STRING: I couldn't help but ask you.

LABEL: 0x843A
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x8448
STRING: "Fufu, do you want to know why...?"

LABEL: 0x85C3
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x85D1
STRING: "It's because Sensei is a murderer."

LABEL: Custom6
STRING: BAD END「Repeat Offender」

LABEL: 0x88DA
STRING: It would be foolish to fight back.

LABEL: 0x8921
STRING: It's probably best to just leave this guy alone.

LABEL: 0x8A5D
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x8A6B
STRING: "Hey, hey... What's all the fuss about?"

LABEL: 0x8B48
STRING: Hearing the commotion, Scykoe came into the classroom.

LABEL: 0x8C47
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x8C55
STRING: "S-Sensei..."

LABEL: 0x8D1B
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x8DFD
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x8E0B
STRING: "So I take it, you guys were having a fight?"

LABEL: 0x8F84
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x8F92
STRING: "My, my. What a terrible bruise... Sheesh, such naughty boys."

LABEL: 0x9129
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x9137
STRING: "Metarou-kun, Yukimaru-kun. Later, come to my office. I'll have a talk with each of you, one at a time."

LABEL: 0x92E8
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x92F6
STRING: "I thought this was the homeroom teacher's job, not the assistant's?"

LABEL: 0x9494
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x94A2
STRING: "Both of you, this isn't a request, this is an order. If you don't come I'll speak to your homeroom teacher to make sure you'll get a penalty."

LABEL: 0x9673
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x9681
STRING: "Fufu, as a teaching assistant this seems like a good learning experience for me. Were you fighting for my sake, the two of you? Thanks."

LABEL: 0x984C
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x985A
STRING: "Oh, and... Nana-san, were you involved as well?"

LABEL: 0x99DD
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x99EB
STRING: "Eh... But I didn't do anything!"

LABEL: 0x9B6D
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x9B7B
STRING: "Yes, I can see that. But you were watching, right? I'll need you to tell me exactly what happened."

LABEL: 0x9D26
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0x9D34
STRING: "Well then, I'll see you later, all three of you."

LABEL: 0x9F43
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x9F51
STRING: "...Damn it. Scykoe-sensei, you came at a bad time."

LABEL: 0xA04D
STRING: As Sensei walked out of the classroom, Yukimaru clucked his tongue.

LABEL: 0xA148
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0xA156
STRING: "...Cut it out, already."

LABEL: 0xA2C7
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0xA2D5
STRING: "...Dammit."

LABEL: 0xA5F3
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0xA601
STRING: "Why me..."

LABEL: 0xA6EB
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0xA6F9
STRING: "Now don't get all coy with me, Nana-san. Can you tell me what's going on?"

LABEL: 0xA8A0
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0xA8AE
STRING: "I've got nothing to say in particular..."

LABEL: 0xAA30
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0xAA3E
STRING: "Ara, Nana-san. It's ok... you can leave if you want."

LABEL: 0xABD7
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0xABE5
STRING: "But if we leave it like this... I won't be able to get to the truth of what happened, you know?"

LABEL: 0xAD78
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0xAD86
STRING: "O-okay, I'll talk. I don't really have any reason to refuse you."

LABEL: 0xAF26
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0xAF34
STRING: "Thank you for your understanding."

LABEL: 0xB0B5
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0xB0C3
STRING: "Metarou didn't come home on Saturday, and because he didn't call his parents and they couldn't get in touch with him, all hell broke loose."

LABEL: 0xB29E
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0xB2AC
STRING: "That's why Yukimaru and I went with his mother to look for him."

LABEL: 0xB444
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0xB452
STRING: "That must have been hard for you, no wonder you're worried. ...So, when you came to school this morning, he was already in your classroom, right?"

LABEL: 0xB60D
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0xB61B
STRING: "Yeah... Can I go now?"

LABEL: 0xB79F
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0xB7AD
STRING: "Yes, thanks a lot. You've been very helpful."

LABEL: 0xB88E
STRING: After their conversation, Nana quickly stood up from her seat.

LABEL: 0xB983
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0xB991
STRING: "Ah, that's right. Nana-san?"

LABEL: 0xBB0C
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0xBB1A
STRING: "There's one more thing I need to ask you."

LABEL: 0xBE42
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0xBE50
STRING: "Yo, Scykoe-sensei."

LABEL: 0xBF3A
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0xBF48
STRING: "Hello, Yukimaru-kun. I believe this is the first time we've spoken in private."

LABEL: 0xC0DB
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0xC0E9
STRING: "Oh, so you heard the details from Nana, right?"

LABEL: 0xC26F
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0xC27D
STRING: "Yeah, I heard. It must have been rough."

LABEL: 0xC400
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0xC40E
STRING: "Metarou..., what does that guy think parents are? It infuriates me."

LABEL: 0xC5AB
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0xC5B9
STRING: "You know, he lost his father quite early on, so his mother is a single parent."

LABEL: 0xC750
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0xC75E
STRING: "So she raised him all by herself, and he doesn't know how tough that is."

LABEL: 0xC90E
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0xC91C
STRING: "Children don't always know what their parents are going through, and it's not until they're older that they realize it."

LABEL: 0xCAD7
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0xCAE5
STRING: "But that doesn't mean he can't tell right from wrong, he's already a high school student, right?"

LABEL: 0xCC95
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0xCCA3
STRING: "Ufufu. Yukimaru-kun, you're so mature. You're making me blush."

LABEL: 0xCE2E
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0xCE3C
STRING: "It's been dangerous recently. It's not safe for a kid to be out alone at night, so I'm sure his mother must have been very worried."

LABEL: 0xCFF9
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0xD007
STRING: "Yeah, so I was super worried too."

LABEL: 0xD19D
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0xD1AB
STRING: "Yes, you're right, Yukimaru-kun. You're... a very kind person."

LABEL: 0xD336
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0xD4A5
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0xD4B3
STRING: "Don't play dumb, Sensei."

LABEL: 0xD62F
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0xD63D
STRING: "...What do you mean, Yukimaru-kun?"

LABEL: 0xD7B2
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0xD7C0
STRING: "You can't hide it from me."

LABEL: 0xD88D
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0xD96A
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0xD978
STRING: "I know all about it, you thought no one noticed? Sorry for trying to trick you."

LABEL: 0xDB2C
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0xDB3A
STRING: "Ara, so that was it. Well then..."

LABEL: 0xDCB5
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0xDCC3
STRING: "Have fun."

LABEL: 0xDECF
STRING: Yukimaru left the room and I entered in his place.

LABEL: 0xDF2A
STRING: I wonder how the talk went, I can't read anything from his expression...

LABEL: 0xDF93
STRING: I sat down across from Sensei.

LABEL: 0xE07F
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0xE08D
STRING: "...Well then, now it's Mecchan's turn."

LABEL: 0xE20C
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0xE21A
STRING: "Why did you do that, Mecchan? You shouldn't have hit someone, you understand?"

LABEL: 0xE3CF
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0xE3DD
STRING: "I'll never get mad at you, so you can always confide in me. I might be able to help you, Mecchan."

LIST.STRING: I want to have dinner with you, Sensei...

LABEL: 0xE5EA
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0xE5F8
STRING: "Fufu, thanks, I appreciate the sentiment, but..."

LABEL: 0xE781
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0xE78F
STRING: "I'm sorry, I've got something I have to do tonight."

LABEL: 0xE920
STRING: Scykoe

LABEL: 0xE92E
STRING: "So, why don't we have dinner some other time? I'll be sure to make some time for you."

LABEL: 0xEB04
STRING: ...What the heck.

LABEL: 0xEB3F
STRING: Normally, Sensei would ask me out herself, but for some reason, I was turned down.

LABEL: 0xEBA8
STRING: I headed home feeling depressed.

LABEL: 0xEBFB
STRING: When I get home, I'll probably get scolded by my mom. ...What a pain.

LABEL: 0xEC6C
STRING: And there's nothing interesting at home anyway, is there?

LABEL: 0xECCB
STRING: I'll just hole up in my room and read the rest of my light novels.

LABEL: 0xED20
STRING: I mean, what else can I do?

LABEL: 0xEDAA
STRING: Speaking of which, what was Sensei up to?

LABEL: 0xEE09
STRING: I'm sure the training assistants have a huge pile of homework to go through.

LABEL: 0xEE68
STRING: Even now she must be working so hard to make her dream of becoming a teacher come true.

LABEL: 0xEECB
STRING: It seems I can't do anything to support her.

LABEL: 0xEF12
STRING: Sensei, until your dream comes true... wouldn't it better for me to stay by your side?

LABEL: 0xF1B3
STRING: It's a memory from the distant past.

LABEL: 0xF1F6
STRING: There was a field of sunflowers near my house.

LABEL: 0xF25B
STRING: Older Girl

LABEL: 0xF26F
STRING: "When I grow up, I want to be a teacher... I want to teach lots of stuff to lots of kids."

LABEL: 0xF308
STRING: Older Girl

LABEL: 0xF31C
STRING: "Teaching isn't just about studying and lessons, it's also about how to think and how to live... It's not easy."

LABEL: 0xF3AF
STRING: Older Girl

LABEL: 0xF3C3
STRING: "When people lose their way, I hope I could help them find their way again."

LABEL: 0xF4A0
STRING: Older Girl

LABEL: 0xF4B4
STRING: "Both kids who are good at studying, and those who aren't."

LABEL: 0xF523
STRING: Older Girl

LABEL: 0xF537
STRING: "I want to protect everyone, I want to save everyone."

LABEL: 0xF5A7
STRING: The sunlight reflects off Onee-chan's glasses.

LABEL: 0xF610
STRING: Older Girl

LABEL: 0xF624
STRING: "How was it? It must be silly, right? A kid like me spouting off all these grand ideals."

LABEL: 0xF6AD
STRING: Older Girl

LABEL: 0xF6C1
STRING: "I don't even know if I can make this happen."

LABEL: 0xF738
STRING: Older Girl

LABEL: 0xF74C
STRING: "Humans are so tiny, and they die so quickly."

LABEL: 0xF80F
STRING: Older Girl

LABEL: 0xF823
STRING: "There may come a day when no matter how hard you work to achieve something, it will be for nothing."

LABEL: 0xF8B0
STRING: Older Girl

LABEL: 0xF8C4
STRING: "So sometimes I ask myself.... what it is that I'm even doing."

LABEL: 0xF940
STRING: Scykoe-oneechan took out a large cube from her pocket.

LABEL: 0xF9A7
STRING: What's this?

LABEL: 0xF9E2
STRING: I tilted my head curiously, as Scykoe-oneechan giggled and smiled.

LABEL: 0xFAB1
STRING: Older Girl

LABEL: 0xFAC5
STRING: "Did you know...? The top and bottom sides of a die always add up to seven."

LABEL: 0xFB52
STRING: Older Girl

LABEL: 0xFB66
STRING: "You know, a long time ago in some faraway country, two prisoners on death row were making a bet for a chance to escape."

LABEL: 0xFBE5
STRING: Older Girl

LABEL: 0xFBF9
STRING: "You roll the dice and whoever gets the biggest roll wins, the loser becomes the bait to let the winner escape."

LABEL: 0xFC90
STRING: Older Girl

LABEL: 0xFCA4
STRING: "One was an ordinary single man, the other was a father with a wife and child waiting at home."

LABEL: 0xFD27
STRING: Older Girl

LABEL: 0xFD3B
STRING: "Which one do you think should win, Mecchan?"

LABEL: 0xFD95
STRING: It was a difficult question for me as a child.

LABEL: 0xFDF2
STRING: How did I answer back then...?

LABEL: 0xFEA7
STRING: Older Girl

LABEL: 0xFEBB
STRING: "As a mere human, I think it would be arrogant to pick a side."

LABEL: 0xFF30
STRING: Older Girl

LABEL: 0xFF44
STRING: "When did humans become so proud as to be able to put a value on life?"

LABEL: 0x1001D
STRING: Older Girl

LABEL: 0x10031
STRING: "Actually, you know, there's no continuation to that story."

LABEL: 0x10098
STRING: Older Girl

LABEL: 0x100AC
STRING: "Maybe in the future it might be made."

LABEL: 0x1010A
STRING: She was─

LABEL: 0x10141
STRING: ─like no other person.

LABEL: 0x10428
STRING: Under the deep blue starry sky.

LABEL: 0x10469
STRING: Illuminated by twinkling stars was a girl, talking with another girl.

LABEL: 0x104EC
STRING: "You came here again? You haven't learned your lesson, I see."

LABEL: 0x1054D
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0x1055B
STRING: "...What? The way you say that, do you hate me or something?"

LABEL: 0x105D6
STRING: "No, I had no ill will, because I'm not one to judge anyone based on their intentions alone."

LABEL: 0x1067D
STRING: "Just like you."

LABEL: 0x106D4
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0x106E2
STRING: "What do you mean?"

LABEL: 0x10745
STRING: "I meant what I meant."

LABEL: 0x1079E
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0x107AC
STRING: "I'm just killing time here, I didn't want to see anyone so I came here at this hour."

LABEL: 0x1083F
STRING: "Then you must forgive me, since I'm here."

LABEL: 0x1089E
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0x108AC
STRING: "Seems so."

LABEL: 0x1090B
STRING: "Well, you making fun of me? You're so cheeky for a kid."

LABEL: 0x10A70
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0x10A7E
STRING: "Ayume-san. I... also feel jealous of you."

LABEL: 0x10AFF
STRING: Daffodil

LABEL: 0x10B11
STRING: "I don't mind, I get that a lot."

LABEL: 0x10B7A
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0x10B88
STRING: "I can't go on like this, I have to find someone to look down on to make myself feel better..."

LABEL: 0x10C11
STRING: Daffodil

LABEL: 0x10C23
STRING: "You are pitiful."

LABEL: 0x10C72
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0x10C80
STRING: "How cruel. I wish you'd think of a nicer way to put that."

LABEL: 0x10DC9
STRING: Daffodil

LABEL: 0x10DDB
STRING: "But still you persistently come to this place... Why?"

LABEL: 0x10E52
STRING: Daffodil

LABEL: 0x10E64
STRING: "You're not here just to see me, are you?"

LABEL: 0x10ED3
STRING: Daffodil

LABEL: 0x10EE5
STRING: "Because it seems like you hate me."

LABEL: 0x10F4C
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0x11083
STRING: Daffodil

LABEL: 0x11095
STRING: "Is it because you want me to affirm your actions?"

LABEL: 0x110F8
STRING: Daffodil

LABEL: 0x1110A
STRING: "Because if you got a pat on the back from cold, cruel me, it'll make you feel better about yourself, right?"

LABEL: 0x11191
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0x1119F
STRING: "That wasn't my intention..."

LABEL: 0x112D8
STRING: Daffodil

LABEL: 0x112EA
STRING: "I'm not going to comfort you."

LABEL: 0x11357
STRING: Daffodil

LABEL: 0x11369
STRING: "I am, unfortunately, not the kind person that you seem to think I am."

LABEL: 0x113E0
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0x113EE
STRING: "You and that person... I want to curse you both."

LABEL: 0x11545
STRING: Daffodil

LABEL: 0x11557
STRING: "You poor thing. You're so full of doubt that you can't trust anyone, can you?"

LABEL: 0x115E6
STRING: Daffodil

LABEL: 0x115F8
STRING: "Go ahead and try it. Curse me to death."

LABEL: 0x11671
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0x1167F
STRING: "I don't care who, but if any one tries to look down on me... I'll drag them down to the same hell as me."

LABEL: 0x11718
STRING: Girl

LABEL: 0x11726
STRING: "If I'm the only one who's going to be ruined, then it's better for everyone to be unhappy."

LABEL: 0x11895
STRING: Daffodil

LABEL: 0x118A7
STRING: "...That being the case, then I guess there's no point in furthering this conversation."

LABEL: 0x11924
STRING: Daffodil

LABEL: 0x11936
STRING: "All the words I've said to you were not able to reach your ears."

LABEL: 0x119BB
STRING: Daffodil

LABEL: 0x119CD
STRING: "I suppose you'll find out."

LABEL: 0x11A34
STRING: Daffodil

LABEL: 0x11A46
STRING: "And you'll regret it."

LABEL: 0x11AA3
STRING: Daffodil

LABEL: 0x11AB5
STRING: "The misfortune you wish on someone else will become the very same misfortune that befalls you."
